name: Crimson
description: Crimson is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its striking red body color resembling rossoCorsa and a sleek design, it stands out among its robotic peers. Its vibrant redBlack screen and cat-shaped buttons add a touch of playfulness to its appearance. Equipped with soldier-like arms and legs, Crimson combines strength and agility, making it a formidable ally in any situation.
